column1: I can't recall what I said last time for this but not sure what we'd use it for...
So I think no unless you have a reason to take
Ok so we agree no?
agree no.
\i think yes for this, may be helpful for eg making shelter, fire wood...
so yes, good
I think this may be too dangerous, though may need to shoot a bear, given where we are!
Only if someone would be able to use it safely.
Ok, we'll say yes.
Not sure what we could use butter for.  Unless it's for eating in this dire emergency?
ok, yes then.  If it's so cold, it won't melt.
newspaper would be handy as fire lighting and extra layer if trying to keep warm.
yes!
couldn't think of a use for lighter without fluid...
some survival expert may know of a use but I think no here.
extra clothes good idea I think - could wear them.
Wear rather than carry, I think as cold weather
I think they are definitely worth taking.
ok.
canvas useful as shelter, even if large and heavy to carry.
agreed.  must be some stronger people who could manage it.
yes, think that's best.
map only a part, but may also help as shelter as plastic.
sorry, just read sectional air map, rather than just a section.
any way, agree useful so should take.
Whisky to anaesthetise everyone?
don't think it's needed!
dangerous to have whisky and a loaded gun!
agree no.
compass useful
yes,  I agree
chocolate full of calories, so useful
bear probably more keen to eat a human!
I'm now wondering why there was a loaded pistol on the flight...
I think we only need to ubmit them.
scary thought.  Glad this is only a theoretical exercise.
ok, let's submit answers. Interesting chat!
hope you like your new home!
